title: Senior Backend Engineer
summary: Highly experienced Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in designing, developing, and deploying scalable, high-performance distributed systems. Proficient in Python, Go, and cloud platforms like AWS, with a proven track record of leading complex projects, mentoring teams, and optimizing backend infrastructure for reliability and efficiency. Passionate about microservices architecture, data-intensive applications, and robust API design.

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, SQS, SNS, ECS, EKS)

description: Led the design and implementation of a new microservices-based order processing system using Python, FastAPI, and Kubernetes on AWS, improving transaction throughput by 30%.
Mentored junior and mid-level engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and system design.
Optimized critical database queries and service interactions, reducing API response times by an average of 25%.
Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitLab CI/CD and ArgoCD for automated deployments across multiple environments.
Collaborated with front-end teams to define robust API contracts (RESTful and GraphQL) for new features.
Designed and implemented scalable data ingestion pipelines for real-time analytics using Python, Apache Kafka, and Spark.
Developed RESTful APIs for internal and external clients, handling millions of requests per day.
Migrated legacy monolithic services to a microservices architecture using Spring Boot (Java) and deployed them to AWS EC2 instances.
Participated in on-call rotation to ensure high availability and quick resolution of production issues.
Contributed to database schema design and optimization for large datasets in MySQL and Cassandra.
Developed and maintained features for a customer-facing web application using Django (Python) and PostgreSQL.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and system reliability.
Collaborated with a small team on daily stand-ups and sprint planning.
Assisted in deploying applications to cloud environments (Heroku, AWS S3/EC2).

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
